title: Compare slopes of industry, firm demand curves

content.question: In the short run in perfect competition, the industry's demand curve and a firm's demand curve have which of the following slopes?

choices.label: Industry's Demand Curve Firm's Demand Curve Horizontal Downward sloping
Industry's Demand Curve Firm's Demand Curve Horizontal Horizontal
Industry's Demand Curve Firm's Demand Curve Downward sloping Horizontal
Industry's Demand Curve Firm's Demand Curve Downward sloping Downward sloping
Industry's Demand Curve Firm's Demand Curve Vertical Horizontal

content.answer: Industry's Demand Curve Firm's Demand Curve Downward sloping Horizontal
